title: Get portfolios within an ad account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: filtering
parameters.description: Filtering conditions. If not specified, you can retrieve all types of creative portfolios excluding CTA portfolios under the specified advertiser account.

parameters.name: creative_portfolio_types
parameters.description: The types of creative portfolios that you want to filter the results by. Enum values: CARD : Display Card portfolio. WEB_INFO_CARD : Website info card portfolio. DOWNLOAD_CARD : Download Card portfolio. INVENTORY_CARD : Inventory Card. PRODUCT_CARD : Product Card portfolio. PRODUCT_TILE : Product Tiles portfolio. COUNTDOWN_STICKER : portfolio of a Countdown Sticker with no reminder. REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER : portfolio of a Countdown Sticker with reminder for a non-LIVE event. LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER : portfolio of a Countdown Sticker with reminder for a LIVE event. GIFTCODE_STICKER : Gift Code Sticker portfolio. PREMIUM_BADGE : Pop-up Showcase portfolio (premium badge portfolio). GESTURE : Gesture portfolio. SUPER_LIKE : Superlike portfolio.

parameters.name: creative_portfolio_ids
parameters.description: The list of creative portfolio IDs that you want to filter the results by. Max size: 100. To create a creative portfolio and obtain a creative portfolio ID, use /creative/portfolio/create/ . Note : IDs of CTA portfolios are not supported.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Default value: 1. Value range: ≥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 20. Value range: [1, 100].

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: creative_portfolios
fields.description: Information about the creative portfolios within the specified ad account.

fields.name: creative_portfolio_id
fields.description: ID of the creative portfolio.

fields.name: creative_portfolio_type
fields.description: Type of the creative portfolio. Enum values: CARD : Display Card portfolio. WEB_INFO_CARD : Website info card portfolio. DOWNLOAD_CARD : Download Card portfolio. INVENTORY_CARD : Inventory Card. PRODUCT_CARD : Product Card portfolio. PRODUCT_TILE : Product Tiles portfolio. COUNTDOWN_STICKER : portfolio of a Countdown Sticker with no reminder. REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER : portfolio of a Countdown Sticker with reminder for a non-LIVE event. LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER : portfolio of a Countdown Sticker with reminder for a LIVE event. GIFTCODE_STICKER : Gift Code Sticker portfolio. PREMIUM_BADGE : Pop-up Showcase portfolio (premium badge portfolio). GESTURE : Gesture portfolio. SUPER_LIKE : Superlike. A Superlike engages the audience with a surprise visual element after they like a video ad. With Superlke, heart-shaped and customized icons float across the screen when the audience likes or double-taps on the ads.

fields.name: creative_portfolio_preview_url
fields.description: Preview link for the creative portfolio. The link won't expire. Note : When creative_portfolio_type is SUPER_LIKE , the value of this field will be the default image of a heart-shaped icon in Superlikes. The preview links of Product Tiles and Inventory Card portfolios are not available. Therefore, when creative_portfolio_type is PRODUCT_TILE or INVENTORY_CARD , the value of this field will be an empty string ( "" ).

fields.name: card_type
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is CARD . Card type. Enum value: IMAGE (Display Card).

fields.name: gesture_type
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE . Gesture type. Enum values: CLICK : Click Gesture. STRAIGHT_SLIDE : Straight Slide Gesture. CURVED_SLIDE : Curved Slide Gesture.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is CARD , WEB_INFO_CARD , INVENTORY_CARD , or SUPER_LIKE . Image ID.

fields.name: pop_up_window_image_id
fields.description: Returned in any of the following scenarios: creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE . creative_portfolio_type is SUPER_LIKE and a pop_up_window_image_id is specified during portfolio creation.. The gesture pop-up card in the Gesture or the ID of the pop-up window image in the Superlike. When creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE , this field represents the gesture pop-up card that will appear after the viewer follows the gesture. When creative_portfolio_type is SUPER_LIKE , this field represents the pop-up window that will appear after the Superlike finishes floating across the screen and will take the audience to the ad landing page when they click on it.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is WEB_INFO_CARD . The title of the card.

fields.name: selling_points
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is WEB_INFO_CARD . The reasons why your products are worth buying.

fields.name: content_url
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is WEB_INFO_CARD . The website URL of your landing page. Note : Specifying the content_url in a website info card via API is currently not supported. You can only retrieve the content_url of website info cards created via the TikTok Ads Manager. For website info cards created via API, the value of this field will be an empty string ( "" ).

fields.name: thumbnail_id
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is DOWNLOAD_CARD , PRODUCT_CARD , PRODUCT_TILE , or PREMIUM_BADGE . Thumbnail ID.

fields.name: call_to_action_text
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE or PREMIUM_BADGE . Interactive guide text for the Gesture or Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: badge_show_time
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE or PREMIUM_BADGE . The time when the Gesture icon within the Gesture or the Premium Badge within the Pop-out Showcase will appear in your video, in seconds.

fields.name: badge_position
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE or PREMIUM_BADGE . Information about the position of the Gesture icon within a Gesture or the Premium Badge within a Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: position_x
fields.description: Relative X-axis value of the top-left corner of the Gesture icon within a Gesture or the Premium Badge within a Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: position_y
fields.description: Relative Y-axis value of the top-left corner of the Gesture icon within a Gesture or the Premium Badge within a Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: angle
fields.description: Returned when badge_position is specified and any of the following conditions is met: creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE and gesture_type is STRAIGHT_SLIDE or CURVED_SLIDE . creative_portfolio_type is PREMIUM_BADGE . The angle of the Straight Slide Gesture or Curved Slide Gesture icon within a Gesture or the Premium Badge within a Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: badge_image_info
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is PREMIUM_BADGE . Information about the badge image in the Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: ID of the badge image in the Pop-out Showcase.

fields.name: slide_length
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE and gesture_type is STRAIGHT_SLIDE . The length of the Straight Slide Gesture.

fields.name: slide_dimension
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE and gesture_type is CURVED_SLIDE . The dimensions of the Curved Slide Gesture.

fields.name: dimension_width
fields.description: The width of the Curved Slide Gesture.

fields.name: dimension_height
fields.description: The height of the Curved Slide Gesture.

fields.name: interactive_music_id
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is GESTURE . The URL of the background music for the Gesture.

fields.name: layouts
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type = DOWNLOAD_CARD . The layout type of the Download Card. Enum values: TYPE_1 : Type 1, showing app description in the Download Card. TYPE_2 : Type 2, not showing app description in the Download Card. When both TYPE_1 and TYPE_2 have been passed in this field, one Type 1 Download card and one Type 2 Download card will be created .

fields.name: description
fields.description: Returned in any of the following scenarios: creative_portfolio_type is DOWNLOAD_CARD and the value of layouts includes TYPE_1 . creative_portfolio_type is INVENTORY_CARD . Description of the app that you want to promote in the Download Card.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is DOWNLOAD_CARD . Tags for the Download Card. Enum values: CATEGORIES ：Showing the category of the app you want to promote in the Download Card. FILESIZE ：Showing the file size of the app you want to promote in the Download Card. RATING ：Showing the rating of the app you want to promote in the Download Card. RANKING ：Showing the ranking of the app you want to promote in the Download Card. COMMENT_VOLUME ：Showing the number of comments for the app you want to promote in the Download Card.

fields.name: category_label
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is DOWNLOAD_CARD and category_label is specified during card creation. Category name of the app you want to promote in the Download Card.

fields.name: app_id
fields.description: Returned when creative_portfolio_type is DOWNLOAD_CARD . ID of the app that you want to promote in the Download Card. It's the App ID from Events Manager.

fields.name: sticker_param
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is COUNTDOWN_STICKER , REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER , LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER , or GIFTCODE_STICKER . Details of the Countdown Sticker or Gift Code Sticker you want to create. You can see an example of Countdown Sticker in Countdown Sticker and an example of Gift Code Sticker in Gift Code Sticker . Note : You can only create one Countdown Sticker or Gift Code Sticker at a time.

fields.name: sticker_type
fields.description: Sticker type. Enum values: COUNTDOWN : A Countdown Sticker with no reminder. REMINDER_COUNTDOWN : A Countdown Sticker with reminder for a non-LIVE event. LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN : A Countdown Sticker with reminder for a LIVE event. GIFTCODE : A Gift Code Sticker that aims to gain new customers and engage existing customers by providing virtual gifts or coupon redemption codes.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Sticker title. For a Countdown Sticker, the maximum length is 54, in UTF-8 bytes, and the hashtag symbol (#) is not supported. For a Gift Code Sticker, the maximum length is 20 in UTF-8 bytes.

fields.name: giftcode
fields.description: Gift code. This field is only applicable for Gift Code Stickers. The maximum length is 10 in UTF-8 bytes (10 letters and numbers). Note : This field is returned only when creative_portfolio_type is GIFTCODE_STICKER .

fields.name: cutoff_time
fields.description: Countdown deadline (when sticker_type is COUNTDOWN or REMINDER_COUNTDOWN ) or LIVE start time (when sticker_type is LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN ) for the Countdown Sticker, in the format of "2022-10-30 00:00:00" (UTC+0 Time). Note : The time your pass in via this field is regarded as UTC+0 time by default and you cannot modify the default time zone. This field is returned only when creative_portfolio_type is COUNTDOWN_STICKER , REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER , or LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER .

fields.name: color
fields.description: Background color of the sticker. For a Countdown Sticker, the supported enum values are ORANGE (orange), BLACK (black), RED (red), and BLUE (blue). For a Giftcode Sticker created through the API, only BLACK and BLUE will be returned. However, ORANGE and RED may be returned for a Gift Code Sticker created on TTAM when orange and red were supported for Gift Code Stickers.

fields.name: display_angle
fields.description: Sticker display angle. Value range: [-180, +180] . +90 means to rotate the sticker clockwise by 90 degrees. Note : This field is not returned for a Gift Code Sticker created through the API. However, it may be returned for a Gift Code Sticker created on TTAM when the display_angle setting was supported for Gift Code Stickers.

fields.name: predefined_placement
fields.description: If the portfolio is a Gift Code Sticker and the predefined placement of the sticker corresponds to an enum value in Predefined placements , this field returns x-axis and y-axis coordinates. If the portfolio is a Countdown Sticker and the predefined placement of the sticker corresponds to an enum value in Predefined placements , this field returns x-axis and y-axis coordinates, and size. For example: If the x-axis coordinate, y-axis coordinate and size of the Countdown Sticker are 196, 148, and 0.8, respectively, which corresponds to the enum value 196x148x0.8 in Predefined placements , this field will be returned as 196x148x0.8 . Note : If the sticker does not correspond to any enum value in Predefined placements , this field returns null .

fields.name: position_x
fields.description: The x-axis coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the screen.

fields.name: position_y
fields.description: The y-axis coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the screen.

fields.name: size
fields.description: Sticker size by percentage. Enum values: 0.6 (60%), 0.7 (70%), 0.8 (80%), 0.9 (90%), 1 (100%), 1.1 (110%). Note : This field is not returned for a Gift Code Sticker created through the API. However, it may be returned for a Gift Code Sticker created on TTAM when the size setting was supported for Gift Code Stickers.

fields.name: opacity
fields.description: Sticker opacity. Enum values: 0.7 , 0.8 , 0.9 , 1 . The lower the value, the more transparent the sticker will be. Note : This field is not returned for a Gift Code Sticker created through the API. However, it may be returned for a Gift Code Sticker created on TTAM when the opacity setting was supported for Gift Code Stickers.

fields.name: reminder_time
fields.description: The time set for the reminder. This field returns a non-null value when creative_portfolio_type is REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER or LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER . For non-LIVE stickers (when sticker_type = REMINDER_COUNTDOWN ), the enum values are: ONE_MINUTE_EARLIER : send the reminder one minute before the non-LIVE event. ONE_HOUR_EARLIER : send the reminder one hour before the non-LIVE event. ONE_DAY_EARLIER : send the reminder one day before the non-LIVE event. For LIVE stickers (when sticker_type = LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN ), the enum values are: ONE_MINUTE_AFTER : send the reminder one minute after the LIVE event starts. FIVE_MINUTES_AFTER : send the reminder five minutes after the LIVE event starts. TEN_MINUTES_AFTER : send the reminder ten minutes after the LIVE event starts.

fields.name: landing_page_url
fields.description: The landing page URL you will be redirected to when you click the reminder after the countdown for an non-LIVE event ends. This field returns a non-null value when creative_portfolio_type is REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER .

fields.name: live_tiktok_user_id
fields.description: TikTok user ID of the LIVE event host. After specifying this field, you will be redirected to the host's LIVE room when you click the reminder for a LIVE event. This field returns a non-null value when creative_portfolio_type is LIVE_REMINDER_COUNTDOWN_STICKER .

fields.name: card_show_price
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is PRODUCT_CARD . Whether to show the price of products on the Product Card or not.

fields.name: card_tags
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is PRODUCT_CARD . The product tags that are shown on the Product Card. Enum values: BRAND (Brand Name), DESC (Description).

fields.name: card_image_index
fields.description: Returned only when creative_portfolio_type is PRODUCT_CARD or PRODUCT_TILE . Used to specify the image used in the Product Card or Product Tiles. The number set via this field is used as index to query the Image URLs you have passed through additional_image_urls in /catalog/product/upload/ . For instance, card_image_index = 1 means that you will use the image via the second image URL in additional_image_urls .

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Paging size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.
